item.description:
Ok, I am going to do Charlie's Singles Hike in the morning before this event.
Guys, there are a lot of single and HOT ladies there at the hike..Charlie hikes far and fast..
Ladies, yes there are hot guys there too...if the buda belly boys make it to the end...maybe they will be worth your while....after a hike like that i need to cool off..
Ok back to the water...
I am going here right after the hike so i guess some time for the drive and lunch...or whatever...

If you are interested..
You look it up... here is the link:
http://essex.com/kaya...

As with all my paddles, i dont set a finish time, when we are done exploring then we are done..or you can always head back earlier...

If Robyn goes, then she uses my spare kayak.

Getting there:
From the north,
Take rte 9 south to exit #3
Take a left onto rte 153 = Plains Road that turns into West Ave under the bridge..
Stay on West Ave for apx .8 miles till you get to the center rotary like thing..will pass Main street, then Pratt St, then take North Main street for one block, the first right should be Bushnell St, take that..
Follow it down toward Dauntless boat yard..right before the boat yard take the left dirt road = Teal Lane to the boat launch area...
This area may be crowded..dont know, it depends on the day and time..
I will have a backup launch location in mind if necessary when at the site or on the road before the site if there is no room...

For more information, see http://essex.com/kaya...

group.who: River and Shore Kayak-r's of CT
group.name: ~~~~HARTFORD COUNTY RIVERS & CT SHORE KAYAK GROUP~~~~ HCR-SK

item.name: Recreational/crossover Kayak Event... Essex Coves
